minesweeper.title: Minesweeper
minesweeper.description: Minesweeper is a single-player puzzle video game. The objective of the game is to clear a rectangular board containing hidden "mines" or bombs without detonating any of them, with help from clues about the number of neighboring mines in each field.

2048.description: 2048 is a popular puzzle game that was developed by Gabriele Cirulli in 2014. It is played on a 4x4 grid. The aim is to reach the number 2048 by merging tiles with the same numbers.

about.description: When I was 7, I realized that I could handle computers. When I was 14 I started programming with a small laptop and got my first programming experience.
